alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL WARE AND NORTH CENTRAL CLINCH COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Argyle, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Argyle, and Cogdell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
